credit_line: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
title: Portrait of a Costumed Figure
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
medium: Black crayon, white chalk, on buff paper
description: Bust-length figure of a girl, her head turned sharply to the right, bowed forward, supported by her left hand. A draped headdress covers her head. Inscribed and signed, lower left: "Study / by Elihu Vedder."
name: Drawing
